text: Nanaimo is a city in British Columbia with a population of 99,863 (2021). The mayor of Nanaimo is Leonard Eugene Krog Nanaimo is located on Vancouver Island and is the second largest city on Vancouver Island. Nanaimo is ranked 57th overall in the 100 largest municipalities in Canada and is nicknamed the "Bathtub Racing Capital of the World" and the "Harbour City". ==References== ==Other websites== *Official city website Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Nanaimo
